BiLSTMModel(
  (lstm): LSTM(100, 256, bidirectional=True)
  (attention_weights_layer): Sequential(
    (0): Linear(in_features=256, out_features=256, bias=True)
    (1): ReLU(inplace=True)
  )
  (liner): Linear(in_features=256, out_features=11, bias=True)
  (act_func): Softmax(dim=1)
)
